channel.title: RuneScape Dialogues
channel.description:
I'm requesting users to go into the game and talk with random NPC's, and to record the dialogues. I'm talking about dialogues with any NPC, located anywhere. For example: Baraek within RuneScape's Varrock SQ. Please do try to steer clear of quest specific NPC's though. I prefer ones like waiters, lone merchants, etc. NPC - dialogue here PLAYER - dialogue here OPTION - dialogues here Then dialogues after OPTION to be marked with a corresponding number so I know which goes with which. I will help to contribute to this thread as well as long as I see some effort being put forth. EDIT:
OPTION1: "Can you sell me some furs?" and "Hello. I am in search of a quest." PLAYER1: "Hello! I am in search of a quest." goes with option two of OPTION1. NPC1: "Sorry kiddo, I'm a fur trader not a damsel in distress." goes with PLAYER1. PLAYER2: "Can you sell me some furs?" goes with option one of OPTION1. NPC2: "Yeah, sure. They're 20 gold coins each." goes with PLAYER2. OPTION2: "Yeah, okay, here you go." and "20 gold coins? That's an outrage!" PLAYER3: "20 gold coins? That's an outrage!" goes with option one of OPTION2. NPC3: "Well, my best price is 18 coins." goes with the PLAYER3. OPTION3: "OK, here you go." and "No thanks, I'll leave it." goes with NPC3. PLAYER4: "OK, here you go." goes with option one of OPTION3. PLAYER5: "No thanks, I'll leave it." goes with option two of OPTION3. PLAYER6: "OK, here you go." goes with option one of OPTION2. GAME: "Baraek sells you a fur."
I know that was rather confusing, I would write this in a switch statement, but the sectional rules say no runescape private server discussion and I didn't know if that would count :/

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Loveandpower:

You know runehq and sals realm shows the dialogues of quests a lot

Yes, I do. I’m not looking for quest dialogues though.

Skiire:

I’m requesting users to go into the game and talk with random NPC’s, and to record the dialogues. For example: Baraek within RuneScape’s Varrock SQ. Please do try to steer clear of quest specific NPC’s though. I prefer ones like waiters, lone merchants, etc.

Read full topic

You know runehq and sals realm shows the dialogues of quests a lot

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:14, topic:437980”][quote author=Skiire link=topic=540698.msg3960889#msg3960889 date=1333272993]
I don’t see how using a bot to do this would be any better then doing it myself as I would have to record it.
[/quote]

Use your imagination, you could use the bot to output the information into xml or any other format. You said it is time consuming but a bot will much faster. I would join some bot forums and ask around on how you can do it, I am sure a simple script would do.[/quote]

I won’t lie, I’m ignorant when it comes to anything like this. I Google’d a few bots but the only legitimate ones I came across were Simba, Robotz in Disguise, and thankfully RareBot. Simba is horribly designed in my opinion and it would take ages in order to create a script possible of doing everything I need with it, robotz in disguise doesn’t allow user-submitted scripts, but RareBot is just what I need. Nonetheless for this I will still need membership, and I’ll have to learn a lot more about RuneScape in order to make a bot capable of venturing around. There are still flaws with this though because there are areas that require levels, items, or quests to be completed in order to gain access to that area. This will mean I’ll have to spend months (not an exaggeration, I hate RuneScape and it would probably take me months if not a year to train an account capable of this) on requirements. Also, I know I could do it if I just set my mind to it, but I just don’t have the determination to go through all of that. I just don’t think a bot will be the best solution to this problem honestly. I’m going to stick to FTP dialogues for now and hopefully someone will contribute later on towards my PTP stash.

xryz:

I plan on getting npc dialogue as well but that not going to happen at the moment and even if I did get p2p npc dialogue i wouldnt just hand it out for free.

If you do start harvesting dialogues at least tell me how you’re doing so.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Skiire:

I don’t see how using a bot to do this would be any better then doing it myself as I would have to record it.

Use your imagination, you could use the bot to output the information into xml or any other format. You said it is time consuming but a bot will much faster. I would join some bot forums and ask around on how you can do it, I am sure a simple script would do.

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:12, topic:437980”][quote author=Skiire link=topic=540698.msg3960889#msg3960889 date=1333272993]
@ Phaze One: I clearly posted within the thread that if no one contributes, I would. Thank-you for taking the time to read the thread. I’ve been rather busy lately and just haven’t had the time.
[/quote]

It was not an intentionally rude or abusive comment, just the fact that you were so unspecific on the NPC/'s you are after it would seem fairly useless for you to simply scratch the surface of the thousands of dialogues that exist in Runescape with a few simple contributions from us.[/quote]

I’m sorry if I came off as rude as well, I didn’t mean too, I was just irritated with the outcome of this thread thus far. Anyways, I don’t have any specific NPC’s, as my goal is to recreate all of RuneScape, although I know that’s a daunting task and so I’ll probably focus on the main cities for the first few months; until I expand outwards and do the lesser known areas. I will disagree with that last part as every addition to a server is content and I would argue that’s not useless.

Read full topic

It was not an intentionally rude or abusive comment, just the fact that you were so unspecific on the NPC/'s you are after it would seem fairly useless for you to simply scratch the surface of the thousands of dialogues that exist in Runescape with a few simple contributions from us.

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:10, topic:437980”]http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/NPC_Contact/dialogue

google4lyf.[/quote]

Appreciated, it’s a great start.

EDIT: That’s for NPC contact with the lunar spell-book, doesn’t have any use for me after all.

xryz:

create a bot that walks around runescape starting at one town and exploring to others. when there is a npc near and it hasnt already been spoken to then walk to it and talk to it, dump all the dialogue. then continue to the next candidate. you could have a couple bots with this script running at the same time so you exponentially decrease the time it takes to complete assuming they communicate with each other and know which npcs have been spoken to.

That would require membership. I want all NPC’s, not just FTP.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

NPC Contact

(Two dialogue choices are presented to the player: "He's an evil wizard! You've got to stop him!" OR "I think he's harmless.") (Three dialogue choices are presented to the player: "Make him get the words wrong!" "Disrupt the magic circle!" OR "Just...

google4lyf.

item.title: RuneScape Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

I don’t see how using a bot to do this would be any better then doing it myself as I would have to record it.

I hate runescape, and watching a bot do it is no different and still as time consuming. If there’s another way a bot could gather these dialogues then please explain as I have minimal knowledge on the game itself, let alone macroes within the game.

@ Phaze One: I clearly posted within the thread that if no one contributes, I would. Thank-you for taking the time to read the thread. I’ve been rather busy lately and just haven’t had the time.

@ Daginith: I didn’t even think about there being dumps, I’ll look into that, thanks.

Read full topic
